DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥ 18 year 2 . Intact healthy skin site device application 3 . Able understand Patient Information Sheet 4 . Willing give inform consent 5 . Willing follow requirement protocol 6 . Subjects chronic venous leg ulcer ( i.e . CEAP classification C6 1 ) great 2 cm2 less 10 cm maximum diameter , 7 . ABPI 0.8 great 1 . History significant haematological disorder DVT precede six month 2 . Pregnant 3 . Pacemakers implantable defibrillator 4 . Use neuromodulation device 5 . Current use TENS pelvic region , back legs 6 . Use investigational drug device within past 4 week may interfere study 7 . Recent surgery ( abdominal , gynaecological , hip knee replacement ) 8 . Recent trauma lower limbs 9 . Size leg incompatible geko™ device . 10 . Chronic obesity ( BMI > 34 ) 11 . Any medication deem significant Investigator 12 .
